name: Legendary Lash & Nail
description: Visit Chicago's premier luxury destination in the heart of Lakeview for all your nail needs.

name: No1 Salon
description: No.1 Salon provides Chicago, IL with quality premium cuts and color! Our stylist have years of experience and have a passion for hair and nails that shows in our work. Whether you need a haircut, color, perm, treatment or manicure, our licensed team can create the look you need.

name: Orleans Nails and Spa
description: Orleans Nails and Spa offers premier nails care and spa treatment services to satisfy your needs of enhancing natural beauty and refreshing your day.

name: M&G Nails
description: M&G Nails offers manicures and pedicures.

name: Logan Square Nail Salon
description: Services include Pedicure & Manicure, Artificial Nails, No Chip Manicure and Waxing. We provide gift certificates and member reward cards. Hygiene is our top priority.

name: Tres Bien Nails
description: Tres Bien Nails provides manicures and pedicures with great attention to detail, amazing color selection and a friendly team.

name: NAILàCARTE
description: NailàCarte is the premier nail salon in Chicago’s West Loop and the best place to receive professional manicures, pedicures, and nail art services. We have a team of dedicated, professional nail technicians who deliver personalized, accessible nail care. Whether you want a no-chip manicure, powder dip nails, professional nail art, or a great pedicure, NailàCarte suits your unique needs.

name: Juko Nail & Skin Rescue
description: Step inside Juko Nail & Skin Rescue, and your skin, fingertips and toes will breathe a sigh of relief. We pamper you with manis, pedis, lash and brow services and waxing, all within our comfortable, modern spa environment.

name: Jenny's Nail Salon
description: We are a neighborhood nail salon specializing in nail care and waxing!We have the perfect environment for pampering and relaxing!

name: Nails By Lina
description: Nails By Lina offers manicures and pedicures.

name: J's Blossom Nail & Spa
description: J's Blossom Nail & Spa provides nail & spa, massage, and waxing services.

name: Revive Nails
description: Revive Nails offers manicures and pedicures.

name: Plush Nail Salon
description: Plush Nail Salon offers manicures, pedicures, and other nail services.

name: Zenails
description: Zenails is it a full service nails salon , we provides our best service for customers , stylish design offering a welcoming ambiance and friendly environment .

name: Chicago's Best Beauty
description: Welcome to our nail salon. Whatever your needs may be, get in touch with us today for more details about our products and services. Wheelchair accessible entrance available. Appointment recommended. We look forward to meeting you.
